Is Cache expensive?

State Oklahoma
Population 2,842

The value of the average home in Cache is $133,100.

Compared to its surrounding areas, Cache is somewhat more expensive, and it is a lot less expensive compared to the rest of the nation. However, it's a bit less expensive compared to Oklahoma City.

Nearby places

Medicine Park

Medicine Park is 9 miles northeast of Cache. Its housing prices are substantially more expensive. Its average home cost is $226,200, which works out to $93,100 (69%) higher than Cache.

Faxon

Faxon is 12 miles south of Cache. Housing prices there are fairly similar. Its average home price is $131,300, which works out to $1,800 (1%) lower than Cache.

Lawton

The city of Lawton is 9 miles east of Cache. Its housing prices are a little less expensive. The average home price there is $112,800, which works out to $20,300 (15%) lower than Cache.

Chattanooga

Chattanooga is 15 miles south of Cache. Its real estate prices are substantially less expensive. Its average home cost is $78,100, which is $55,000 (41%) lower than Cache.

Geronimo

Geronimo is 15 miles southeast of Cache. Its housing prices are a lot less expensive. Its average home price is $75,900, which comes out to $57,200 (42%) lower than Cache.
